Changelog for collective.types.externalsearch

    (name of developer listed in brackets)

11.04 - 2011-04-04
-----------------

* Added optional link that appears on the title in listings above the search box
  [dunlapm]

* Added auto-zcml slug entry point so you no longer need a zcml= entry in your
  buildout.cfg
  [dunlapm]

9.04 - 2009-04-30
-----------------

* Added option to open searches in a new window
  [dunlapm]
  
* Fixed error with attributes on the search button appearing when there was no
  value.
  [dunlapm]


9.02
--------------

* Initial Release
